mapper.insert: insert into auth_roles (id, `name`, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at from auth_roles
